original_text: Jesus saw this man. He knew that the man had been ill like this for a very long time. So he asked the man, ‘Do you want to get well?’
korean_text: 예수께서 그 누운 것을 보시고 병이 벌써 오래된 줄 아시고 이르시되 네가 낫고자 하느냐

sentences.original_text: He knew that the man had been ill
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 사람이 병들었었다는 것을 알았습니다.

sentences.original_text: like this for a very long time.
